Name: Seventh Seraph Service Revoler (Destiny 2)
Description:
First gun I've made so it was a good learning experience.

Lots of work to do still on it, including getting the sights working. For now, there's an invisible rail on top and I highly recommend you use it. 

It accepts .357 magnum and if you want to use a speedloader there is one under the Unica6. It might look like the bullets won't line up with the loader but thanks to Anton that's not a problem. The chambers are supposed to look wonky, no need for concern. 

Let me know if you find anything!

Intall by extracting the files to your VirtualObjects folder.
